Uses of Interface
fr.upmc.components.ComponentI

  • Packages that use ComponentI 
    Package Description
    fr.upmc.components
    Basic component model.
    fr.upmc.components.cvm
    Component virtual machines for both single computer and distributed deployments.
    fr.upmc.components.cvm.pre.dcc
    Dynamic remote component creation and connection for component assemblies.
    fr.upmc.components.cvm.pre.dcc.ports  
    fr.upmc.components.examples.basic_cs.components  
    fr.upmc.components.examples.basic_cs.ports  
    fr.upmc.components.examples.ddeployment_cs.components
    Components for the dynamic client/server example The dynamic client/server example uses three components: DynamicURIConsumer is the dynamic version of the component URIConsumer of the basic client/server example.
    fr.upmc.components.examples.ddeployment_cs.components.ports  
    fr.upmc.components.extensions.coordinators.tuplespace.components  
    fr.upmc.components.extensions.coordinators.tuplespace.ports  
    fr.upmc.components.extensions.examples.semaphore.components  
    fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizers.components
    Le SynchronizerManager et le DistributedSynchronizerManager vont assurer la création de composants de synchronisation, présents dans le package fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.components.syncTools.
    fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizers.components.syncTools
    Composants/outils de synchronisation, offrant des services parfois bloquant afin de permettre à des composants clients de se synchroniser entre eux.
    fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizers.ports
    Ports d'accès au service du SynchronizerManager Le package fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.ports fournit les ports inbound et outbound qui permettent d'utiliser les services du SynchronizerManager.
    fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizers.ports.syncTools.arrayBlockingQueue
    Ports d'accès aux services du ArrayBlockingQueue Le package fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.ports.syncTools.arrayBlockingQueue fournit les ports utiles pour l'outil de synchronisation ArrayBlockingQueue.
    fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizers.ports.syncTools.countDownLatch
    Ports d'accès aux services du CountDownLatch Le package fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.ports.syncTools.countDownLatch fournit les ports utiles pour l'outil de synchronisation CountDownLatch.
    fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizers.ports.syncTools.cyclicBarrier
    Ports d'accès aux services du CyclicBarrier Le package fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.ports.syncTools.cyclicBarrier fournit les ports utiles pour l'outil de synchronisation CyclicBarrier.
    fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizers.ports.syncTools.semaphore
    Ports d'accès aux services du Semaphore Le package fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.ports.syncTools.semaphore fournit les ports utiles pour l'outil de synchronisation Semaphore.
    fr.upmc.components.ports
    Hierarchy of ports to expose interfaces of components and interconnect them.
    fr.upmc.components.pre.plugins  
    fr.upmc.components.pre.plugins.ports  
    fr.upmc.components.pre.reflection.ports

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractComponent
      The class AbstractComponent represents the basic information and methods for components in the component model.
      protected static class  AbstractPlugin.Fake
      The static class Fake implements a fake component used to call the services of the component on which the plug-in is to be installed or uninstalled.

    • Uses of ComponentI in fr.upmc.components.cvm.pre.dcc

      Classes in fr.upmc.components.cvm.pre.dcc that implement ComponentI 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DynamicComponentCreator
      The class DynamicComponentCreator defines components that will be automatically added in each of the sites of a distributed component assembly to allow for the dynamic remote creation of components on the virtual where the component is running.

      The class URIProvider implements a component that provides URI creation services.

      The class DynamicURIConsumer is the dynamically deployed version of the component URIConsumer of the basic client/server example.

    • Uses of ComponentI in fr.upmc.components.pre.plugins

      Methods in fr.upmc.components.pre.plugins with parameters of type ComponentI 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void PluginI.installOn(ComponentI owner)
      initialise the plug-in reference to its owner component and add to the component every specific information, ports, etc. required to run the plug-in; subclasses should add any other initialisation necessary to make the plug-in work in the context of its owner.
